thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing staff
thread.title_full: Amazing staff - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gBiliz
title: Amazing staff
text: I'd like to thank to the amazing staff for being so polite and caring through my stay. As a solo female traveller and a smoker i asked them for a room with a balcony and they upgraded my regular room to a room with a sweet little balcony and a great view for free. The front desk gentleman Mr. Mounir was so kind and friendly. The only thing i disliked about the hotel was that i had no access to the wifi from my room which was at the 3rd floor.
